#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<utility>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

typedef long long int LL;
const LL mod = 100000007LL;

pair<LL,LL> a[4];

LL gcd(LL a , LL b) {   
        if (a < b) {
                LL temp = a;
                a = b;
                b = temp;
        }
        if (b == 0)     
                return a;
        return gcd (b , a % b);
}

int main() {
        int T;
        scanf("%d",&T);
        while (T--) {
                for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
                        LL t1 , t2;
                        scanf("%lld %lld", &t1 , &t2);
                        a[i].first = t1;
                        a[i].second = t2;
                }                
                sort(a,a+4);
                LL x1 = (a[1].first - a[0].first);
                LL y1 = (a[1].second - a[0].second);
                
                if (x1 < 0)     
                        x1 = -x1;
                if (y1 < 0)
                        y1 = -y1;
                
                LL g = gcd(x1 , y1);
                x1 %= mod;
                y1 %= mod;
                LL area = (x1 * x1 + y1 * y1) % mod; 
                LL n = (area + 1 - g -g) % mod;
                LL ans = (2 * n * area) %mod;
                while (ans < 0)
                        ans += mod;
                printf("%lld\n",ans);
        }
        return 0;
}
